2.2.name: wordpress/fb-recommend
2.2.description:
This plugin will automaticaly add a facebook recommend button to each of your post/page, after the post body. Facebook recommend option is an revolutionary invention for social media optimization. The recommend button lets a user share your content with friends on Facebook. When the user clicks the Like button on your site, a story appears in the user's friends' News Feed with a link back to your website.
This plugin add only the facebook recommend button, no background run or hidden links.

As simple as possible. Personal Blog: DannielPH Studio
